name: Test
tree:
<reactive-fallback>
	<reactive-sequence>
		<get_biggest_damager output="damager"/>
		<set_target input="damager"/>
		<target_position output="position"/>
		<goto target="position" distance="2"/>
	</reactive-sequence>
	<repeat>
		<fallback>
			<sequence>
				<random chance="0.16"/>
				<random_block_position output="random_position"/>
				<goto target="random_position" distance="1" ignore_y="true"/>
			</sequence>
			<sequence>
				<random chance="0.20"/>
				<look_at_player/>
				<sleep time="1"/>
			</sequence>
			<sequence>
				<random chance="0.20"/>
				<random_look_around/>
				<sleep time="1"/>
			</sequence>
			<sleep time="1"/>
		</fallback>
	</repeat>
</reactive-fallback>
